title: permabanned?
body:
Riot,
       About 3 days ago i logged into my league account and it showed up with the In-Game punishment card i was surprised that i was banned because about 4 days earlier i had played 2 games of Aram with my friends and i know i didn't chat much because it was a 5 man and i was currently in a discord chat  so anything that would go against the summoners code i said simply into my voice call (my friends were way worse then me to the point i probably shouldn't call them friends anymore). when i logged into my account on Saturday night it said my account was banned. I consulted my friends immediately and i told them i was permanently banned from league of legends, my friends quickly responded that a few days after the Aram game i had played with them. I asked them if i was in the voice call with them to which they told me i refused to join the call and had simply said that my younger brothers were being very loud and it would be annoying (I'm a only child). I looked through my op.gg page and sure enough there were numbers of matches where everything was off such as my flash keys and every single game looked like i was intentionally feeding https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=explodingape. ( I have never gotten a chat ban or temporary suspension before except for leaver buster because of bad wifi)
I have have and never will account share because there is no chance in hell that i would ever gamble a $230 dollar account to any of my friends. It was clear that someone who i had somehow obtained my login info was playing on my account while i was away at school. Because this is my only account i am wondering what i can or should do if possible to get my account Un-Suspended.
                                                                                                                                              
                                                                                                                                                  With Many Thanks, 
                                                                                                                                                                                   ExplodingApe

replies.body: If you submit a [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) over to our player behavior team, we can investigate what took place on your account. It's best to make your password something complex and logout every time you're done with your matches, so this type of thing doesn't take place!

Heya Exploding,

You might actually benefit more if you post that in [Player Behavior](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation) where a Arbiter/Rioter can assist you. Good luck in the rift!
do you guys have any suggestions?
